class.rdfs:comment:
The act of obtaining an object under an agreement to return it at a later date. Reciprocal of LendAction.

Related actions:

* [[LendAction]]: Reciprocal of BorrowAction.
class.rdfs:label: BorrowAction

schema:lender.rdfs:comment: A sub property of participant. The person that lends the object being borrowed.
schema:lender.rdfs:label: lender
